channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 03:33 Driven to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 03:33 Driven to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further messages.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 03:25 Dumping anxiety in Rivne region.Creat by further messages.

item.title: 游리 02:47 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchanskaya Territorial Community
